name: Super Opera Squad
description:
Everyone's a diva in SOS! 5 players act as both performer AND stage crew. Hog the spotlight! Move the props! Bask in fan's praise!  Super Opera Squad is in active development, but you can play the current build here.  The game will start automatically.  It will detect up to 5 gamepads if they're hooked up to your machine and automatically map them to the players. 

Controls:

Move with left stick

Using Xbox buttons as example:

A = jump

B = Interact/Grab

X = Dance

Y = Sing

There are also 2 keyboard players for testing out if you don't own a gamepad

Keyboard1

WASD = Movement

LCtrl

LAlt

LShift

Space Bar

Keyboard2

Arrow keys = Movement

RCtrl

RAlt

RShift
